quote: This is the history of Noah’s sons, Shem, Ham, and Jaʹpheth. Sons were born to them after the Flood.
From there he got up and came to the borders of Ju·deʹa across the Jordan, and again crowds gathered to him. As he was accustomed to do, he again began teaching them.
After these things the Lord designated 70 others and sent them out by twos ahead of him into every city and place where he himself was to go.
